Module de.bp.pacman
Package de.bp.pacman

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
de.bp.pacman.GameManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Gameboard
public class GameManager extends Object implements Gameboard
Gamanager manages the pacman-game

      public static GameManager createInstance(GamePane pane, int numberOfPlayer, Options options, int level)
      Returns an existing gamemanager if there is one, otherwise creates a new.
      Parameters:
      pane - graphical unit
      numberOfPlayer - number of players
      options - options instance containing the current game options
      level - the selected level
      Returns:
      a new GameManager instance

    • isCloseGame

      public boolean isCloseGame()
      This method helps to close the game after the game is over. This allows the game to run the game a little longer after it is over.
      Returns:
      a boolean to close the game.
